We want to thank our sponsors and supporters:

## Friends of the TU Berlin

[Gesellschaft von Freunden der TU Berlin e.V.](https://www.tu.berlin/communication/freunde) for sponsoring our trips to competitions and events.

<a href="https://www.tu.berlin/communication/freunde" target="_blank">
    <img src="sponsors_images/GvF_Logo_final_RGB_300.jpg" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; height: 5em;"/>
</a>

## CubeMars

[CubeMars](https://www.cubemars.com/) for supporting us with motors for the [rover](/projects/Rover/).

<a href="https://www.cubemars.com/" target="_blank">
    <img src="sponsors_images/CUBE_MARS_LOGO.png" style="display: block; margin: 0 auto; height: 5em;"/>
</a>

## Tesla

[Tesla](https://www.tesla.com/en_eu) for the battery pack for our [rover](/projects/Rover/).
